/* com.innobiz.orange.web.wo.dao.WoOnecApvLnDDao.selectWoOnecApvLnD */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.AGNT_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AGNT_NM,
FROM ( SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
TOP (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ${orderBy}N.ONEC_NO DESC, N.VER DESC, N.APV_LN_PNO DESC, N.APV_LN_NO DESC) AS RNUM, N.* FROM (SELECT
T.ONEC_NO, T.VER, T.APV_LN_PNO, T.APV_LN_NO, T.APVR_ROLE_CD, T.APV_STAT_CD, T.ABS_RSON_CD, T.ABS_RSON_NM, T.PRED_YN, T.AGNT_UID, T.APVR_UID, T.APVR_NM, T.POSIT_DISP_VA, T.SIGN_DISP_VA, T.DT_DISP_VA, T.SIGN_IMG_PATH, CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), T.APV_DT, 120) APV_DT,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.AGNT_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AGNT_NM,
FROM WO_ONEC_APV_LN_D T
AND T.ONEC_NO = #{onecNo, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND T.VER = #{ver, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND T.APV_LN_PNO = #{apvLnPno, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND T.APV_LN_NO = #{apvLnNo, jdbcType=INTEGER} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.ONEC_NO, T.VER, T.APV_LN_PNO, T.APV_LN_NO
) N ) M WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND RNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M ORDER BY ${orderBy}M.ONEC_NO DESC, M.VER DESC, M.APV_LN_PNO DESC, M.APV_LN_NO DESC
